item.title: Biden officials race to help stabilize Syria after regime collapse
item.description: President Joe Biden announced that U.S. forces had hit Islamic State militant camps and operatives in Syria.

item.title: Federal employees scramble to insulate themselves from Trump’s purge
item.description: Career civil servants are scrubbing social media, changing job titles and looking for private sector work over fear that Trump may fire them.
